text: Entissar Amer (; born 3 December 1956) is an Egyptian socialite. She is the current First Lady of Egypt, since her husband Abdel Fattah el-Sisi became the Sixth President of Egypt in 2014. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies of Egypt Category:People from Cairo Category:Ain Shams University alumni
title: Entissar Amer
